## Authenticator.authenticate() method

Augment the request with authentication information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
authenticate(requestOptions: AuthenticateOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
